description.value: You aim your weapon in a superficial cut above your opponent's eye. Make a Strike with the imbued ikon. If that Strike is successful, the target must succeed at a @Check[fortitude|against:exemplar] save against your class DC or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Blinded] for 1 round or until it uses an Interact action to clear the blood from its vision.
